title: THCudaCheck Error
body_html:
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1502009910772/work/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.c line=32 error=4 : unspecified launch failure
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "resnet50_avg.py", line 133, in <module>
    model = train_model(model, criterion, optimizer_ft, exp_lr_scheduler, n_epochs=70)
  File "resnet50_avg.py", line 87, in train_model
    running_loss += loss.data[0]
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (4) : unspecified launch failure at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1502009910772/work/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.c:32

It occurs in Epoch 3/69. I don't know how to solve it. Can anyone help?
